description.imageFocus: Where to focus in the background.
description.video: Display a video as a background. This option will replace image.
description.title: The title text
description.stretch: Always stretch the hero vertically. Makes the hero the width of the viewport. Requires a centered container.
description.ariaLabel: Label provided for accessibility tools such as screen readers
description.customHeroData: An array containing the custom data for the selected view (heroView).
